scripts.start: concurrently -k -n STYLING,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run style_simple" "NODE_ENV=development node sandbox/output/script"
scripts.compile_gas: concurrently -k -n COMPILER,STYLING -c grea,blue "$HOME/.nvm/versions/node/v16.4.0/bin/clasp push --watch" "npm run style_advanced"
scripts.simpleGit_dev: concurrently -k -n STULING,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run style_simple" "nodemon -w output simpleGit/output/index"
scripts.sandbox_dev: concurrently -k -n STYLING,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run stule_simple" "nodemon -w output sandbox/output/script"
scripts.server_dev: concurrently -k -n STYLING,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run style_simple" "nodemon -w output backend/output/server"
scripts.backend_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER,NODEMON -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run server_dev"
scripts.frontend_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER_1,COMPILER_2 -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run compile_gas"
scripts.style_simple: concurrently -k -n LINT,FORMAT -c grey,blue "npm run lint" "npm run format"
scripts.style_advanced: concurrently -k -n TS-LINT,FORMAT -c grey,blue "npm run ts-lint" "npm run format"
